Articles.Content:
True. 1t to orbit with a reusable spacecraft is fun.

The user below me dislikes mech jeb.

False, it's quite useful for rendez-vous launches with tricky timing and regular, repetitive, launches.

The user below me is bad at designing planes.

i'm not that bad, i'm just not particularly good...

the user below me is good at designing rovers (Warranty Void if next poster is either RoverDude or Alexustas)

I'm not sure... but most of my rovers tend to not explode. So true?

The user below me loves making Space Shuttle style spacecraft.

I do not.

The user below me does not own KSP on Steam, like me.

True. KSP Store 4eva!

The user below me has bought KSP for a friend.

False.

The user below me is not the droid I am looking for.

False

The user below me is a whale next to a bowl of petunias falling onto an alien world

No but I wish I knew what the petunia was thinking.

The user below me does not get the my reference

True..ish. It might be from the Hitchiker's guide to teh galaxy.

The user below me likes one or more of the following bands: Soundgarden, Alice in Chains, Audioslave, Temple of the Dog, Rage Against the Machine, and/or Pearl Jam.

I like almost all of those, what with me being a teenager in the '90s.

The user below me despises hip-hop music.

Not a fan of it.

The user below isn't Canadian.

True. Though I wish I was.

The user below wrote the reply on a laptop.

Nope, PC.

The user below me is alive.

False

*wheeze* the user below me is a fan of homestuck.

Fan of what?

The user below me is from South Korea.

Nope, Rule Britannia.

The user below me can see the Andromeda galaxy from where they are.

true

the user below me is male

How could you have known? O_O

The user below me doesn't make a habit of eating chimpanzee for dinner.

"Habit" is such a strong word, so yes.

The user below me has read at least one book by Robert Heinlein.

...whut?

The user below me is yes.

No my name is Jacob.

The user below me has crashed on the mun.

True about 350 times once into the mun arch

the user below me is false

True.

The yankee below me is a user.

True, but I defeated the MCP and returned to the real world.

The user below me won't get the reference...
